mapper.select: SELECT id, category_id, title, base_price, unit, deposit_type, description FROM pms_service WHERE category_id = #{categoryId} ORDER BY id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pms_service (category_id, title, base_price, unit, deposit_type, description) VALUES (#{categoryId}, #{title}, #{basePrice}, #{unit}, #{depositType}, #{description})
mapper.update: UPDATE pms_service SET category_id = #{categoryId}, title = #{title}, base_price = #{basePrice}, unit = #{unit}, deposit_type = #{depositType}, description = #{description} WHERE id = #{id}
